creator: SunzTech
descriptionHtml:
Sahih Muslim Sharif (صحيح مسلم, ṣaḥīḥ Muslim, full name Al-Musnad Al-Sahihu bi Naklil Adli) is one of the Kutub al-Sittah (six main Hadees Books) of the hadees in Sunni Islam. It is the second most genuine hadees collection after Sahih al-Bukhari Sharif and is extremely acclaimed by Muslims. It was collected by Muslim ibn al-Hajjaj, also known as Imam Muslim. All Sahih Hadees translates as authentic or correct.

Sahih Muslim Islamic Hadees Book is for Muslims in the English, Urdu and Arabic Language with a simple and beautiful layout. Useful Features are made to provide the most ease of use of this Android Application. You must of capable to read and understand the English to learn these books properly.

Read the Sahih Muslim Sharif Hadees Book Translated in the English, Urdu, and Arabic Language for your Android smartphones with built-in text customization features. User can send or share any Hadees on social media and other platforms like Gmail etc.

Sahih Muslim Sharif APP Features:
✔️The app is optimized for all Android devices including tabs
✔️You can go to any Hadith by typing its number in the bar
✔️Full Sahih Muslim Sharif Book
✔️User-friendly interface and simple graphics used
✔️User can select any Hadees to open
✔️User can bookmark any Hadiths for after reading
✔️Word count for Hadith available
✔️User can share any Hadees with friends and social media.
✔️User Can send or share any part of the text of any Hadith to your friends.
✔️User can easily zoom in or zoom out any Hadees
✔️Flip the pages by touch.
✔️Scroll down the page and read Hadits
✔️The app is free to download and install


If you want to read sayings of Holy Prophet (PBUH) in Urdu, or looking for an authentic collection of Imam Muslim Ahadith. “Sahih Muslim Urdu Hadith Book” is just a perfect app for you to have on your device then. Download the app to read or share Muslim Sharif Ahadiths right now.

Alhamdulillah, by the Grace of Allah Taa'la alone, we have published this app for free. We do not show any advertisement or in-app-purchases and also do not accept any donation/funding. We have published this app only seeking the pleasure of Allah Taa'la alone and seeking reward from none other than Him.

Please leave us a review and a good rating for the developer if you like our Hadees app. We’ll use your feedback to make changes and improve the app to give you a better experience for the next time. Thanks!

creator: SunzTech
descriptionHtml:

✔️The app is optimized for all Android devices including tabs
✔️You can go to any Hadith by typing its number in the bar

✔️User-friendly interface and simple graphics used
✔️User can select any Hadees to open

✔️User can share any Hadees with friends and social media.

✔️User can easily zoom in or zoom out any Hadees
✔️Flip the pages by touch.
✔️Scroll down the page and read Hadits
✔️The app is free to download and install
